description: LEGAL EMPOWERMENT OF THE POOR & FORMALIZATION OF THE INFORMAL SECTOR

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The Project aims at addressing the institutional gaps and challenges regarding property and business environments, encouraging the poor in the informal sector entities to enter the formal system. This will be through offering them as an incentive those essential legal tools that will not only improve their life standard  and business, but helps transform their society, preserves their property rights, organizes their businesses and identifies mechanisms to access expanded markets, nationally and internationally.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: LEGAL EMPORMENT OF THE POOR
